name: Crash-land
description:
A interplanetary adventurer has a mishap and crash lands upon an uncharted, yet mysteriously inhabited plane, will he able to fix his spaceship and escape?

An adventure puzzle game where you collect items and abilities to proceed past obstacles. No puzzle will be started without you choosing to do so, but each one will result in a game over if failed, so be sure to save before each.

An RPG Maker MV project made for the Heavy Pepper Games RPG Maker RTP-Only game jam for October 2022This is my first project ever with any sort of RPG Maker, it was great to have the opportunity to give it a go, I hope someone enjoys it.
